title: Death by a Thousand Cuts: Nuisance DDoS Attacks in the Games Industry
description: At Akamai, we talk a lot about DDoS attacks. It's because we're pretty good at handling them. We've stopped many of the world's biggest attacks. And, while less common, they get a lot of attention. But we can also stop the world's smallest attacks. And we stop lots of them. It's these smaller attacks that we're talking about today.
author: Jonathan Singer
